Key Match Events: Bowden Francis held Boston hitless through 5 1/3 innings
Francis' no-hit bid ended with one out in the sixth, when Nick Sogard blooped a soft single to center
The Blue Jays took the lead in the third when Brian Serven doubled and scored on Vladimir Guerrero Jr.â€™s double
They made it 2-0 in the sixth on back-to-back doubles from Addison Barger and Ernie Clement
The Red Sox just missed a triple play in the ninth
Miscellaneous Highlights: Rich Hill's 2024 debut, making him the only active player to have appeared in each of the last 20 seasons
Joe Loperfido was removed after colliding with the Green Monster
Trevor Story will start a rehab assignment soon
Rafael Devers missed his third straight due to shoulder soreness
